channel.title: Unable to connect to data sources in self hosted EKS setup
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
We have installed redash on a self-hosted EKS environment, however, anytime we try to connect to a data source we are unable to. We have followed a similar setup to [here](https://github.com/nanit/redash-kubernetes)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:7.0 * Browser/OS: safari/chrome * How did you install Redash: EKS k8s deployment

item.title: Unable to connect to data sources in self hosted EKS setup
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
I’m guessing this is a firewall issue. But I don’t know the first thing about configuring port forwarding in k8s.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to connect to data sources in self hosted EKS setup
